mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AOPBOARD(no, title, content, writer) VALUES (AOPBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE AOPBOARD SET title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT no, title, content, writer, reg_date FROM AOPBOARD WHERE no > 0 ORDER BY NO DESC, reg_date DESC
